rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
与阿尔茨海默病治疗相关的脑容量损失可能是由淀粉样斑块去除引起的伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项研究发现，与阿尔茨海默病新免疫疗法相关的脑容量损失可能是由于淀粉样斑块的去除引起的，而不是神经元或脑组织的损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Brain-volume-loss-linked-to-Alzheimers-treatment-may-be-caused-by-amyloid-plaque-removal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Brain-volume-loss-linked-to-Alzheimers-treatment-may-be-caused-by-amyloid-plaque-removal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d964e551-47da-4449-8e92-8856deea8d79 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 12:47:03 -0500 Brain volume loss linked to Alzheimer's treatment may be caused by amyloid plaque removal
严重的妊娠并发症会降低生育更多孩子的可能性卡罗林斯卡学院研究人员在《美国医学会杂志》上发表的一项研究报告称，在第一次怀孕或分娩期间遭受严重并发症的女性不太可能生育更多孩子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Severe-pregnancy-complications-reduce-likelihood-of-having-more-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Severe-pregnancy-complications-reduce-likelihood-of-having-more-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d532010-9bc9-4c4a-b11b-7435c55405c2 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 12:39:00 -0500 Severe pregnancy complications reduce likelihood of having more children
制定强有力的措施来研究社会决定因素如何影响脊髓损伤的结果凯斯勒基金会的研究人员制定了强有力的社区经济因素衡量标准，以研究社会决定因素如何影响脊髓损伤 (SCI) 后的健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Robust-measures-development-to-study-how-social-determinants-influence-spinal-cord-injury-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Robust-measures-development-to-study-how-social-determinants-influence-spinal-cord-injury-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fbccab6-ab1d-4709-b095-5a8142f7c0ae Mon, 25 Nov 2024 12:31:52 -0500 Robust measures developed to study how social determinants influence spinal cord injury outcomes
新研究探讨了与家人住在一起的心理影响我们中的许多人都会沉浸在感恩节期间家庭聚会带来的欢乐和戏剧中。但除了感恩节餐桌之外，新的研究表明，与家人一起生活和相处往往会以一些令人惊讶的方式影响我们的心理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/New-research-explores-the-psychological-effects-of-living-near-family.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/New-research-explores-the-psychological-effects-of-living-near-family.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=772188f9-7b29-496a-b39e-f240bdd775a4 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 12:13:57 -0500
IASLC 和 LCRF 宣布首位肺癌研究资助对象国际肺癌研究协会 (IASLC) 和肺癌研究基金会 (LCRF) 宣布了 IASLC LCRF 团队科学研究资助金“下一步治愈癌基因驱动肺癌奖”的第一位资助者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/IASLC-and-LCRF-announce-first-grant-recipient-for-lung-cancer-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/IASLC-and-LCRF-announce-first-grant-recipient-for-lung-cancer-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05343741-173b-44a6-be5f-8cb32a37e7c9 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 12:03:50 -0500 IASLC and LCRF announce first grant recipient for lung cancer research
汉密尔顿和阿玛贝尔·詹姆斯人工智能与人类健康中心在西奈山成立今天，纽约市最大的学术医疗系统之一西奈山卫生系统宣布开设汉密尔顿和阿玛贝尔·詹姆斯人工智能与人类健康中心，该中心致力于通过研究、开发和创新人工智能（AI）工具和技术的应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Hamilton-and-Amabel-James-Center-for-AI-and-Human-Health-launches-at-Mount-Sinai.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Hamilton-and-Amabel-James-Center-for-AI-and-Human-Health-launches-at-Mount-Sinai.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a0761b5-1035-4a78-9ef7-9184d57259da Mon, 25 Nov 2024 11:56:29 -0500 Hamilton and Amabel James Center for AI and Human Health launches at Mount Sinai
ASTRO 发布治疗局部晚期直肠癌的更新指南美国放射肿瘤学会 (ASTRO) 今天为使用放射疗法治疗局部晚期直肠癌患者的医生发布了更新的临床指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/ASTRO-releases-updated-guidelines-for-treating-locally-advanced-rectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/ASTRO-releases-updated-guidelines-for-treating-locally-advanced-rectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f538cc9-53b5-49df-912c-e1c0dd2e4f45 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 11:51:05 -0500 ASTRO releases updated guidelines for treating locally advanced rectal cancer
子宫内膜异位症和子宫肌瘤病史与较高的早期死亡长期风险相关研究人员研究了子宫内膜异位症和子宫肌瘤对过早死亡风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/History-of-endometriosis-and-纤维瘤-linked-to-higher-long-term-risk-of-early-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/History-of-endometriosis-and-纤维瘤-linked-to-higher-long-term-risk-of-early-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99b6a83d-1687-4ec1-8231-acc5e7abca2d Mon, 25 Nov 2024 11:51:00 -0500 History of endometriosis and fibroids linked to higher long-term risk of early death
沃什特诺县卫生局和密歇根大学公共卫生学院宣布建立新的合作伙伴关系沃什特诺县卫生局和密歇根大学公共卫生学院宣布建立正式的学术卫生部门合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Washtenaw-County-Health-Department-and-UM-School-of-Public-Health-announce-new-partnership.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/Washtenaw-County-Health-Department-and-UM-School-of-Public-Health-announce-new-partnership.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eaddea99-8451-4613-b3cc-e489a3f44164 Mon, 25 Nov 2024 11:45:50 -0500
乳腺癌患者对他莫昔芬的反应可能与肠道微生物组有关一项新研究表明，人类肠道微生物群的变化会影响他莫昔芬的药代动力学，从而影响该药物的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/How-breast-cancer-病人-respond-to-tamoxifen-may-be-linked-to-the-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241125/How-breast-cancer-病人-respond-to-tamoxifen-may-be-linked-to-the-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9dd3467-2c82-4e65-9840-0480bb79ff4d Mon, 25 Nov 2024 11:41:20 -0500 How breast cancer patients respond to tamoxifen may be linked to the gut microbiome
